code: import{sendedit}from"../../types";export var sendEditPostAction=function sendEditPostAction(data){return{type:sendedit,payload:data};};var sendEditPostFunction=function sendEditPostFunction(post_id,props,data){return function(dispatch){var URL="https://tracey.propulsion-learn.ch/backend/api/social/posts/".concat(post_id,"/");var token=props.SignInReducer.token;var headers=new Headers({'Content-Type':'application/json','Authorization':"Bearer ".concat(token)});var config={method:'PUT',headers:headers,body:JSON.stringify(data)};fetch(URL,config);dispatch(sendEditPostAction(data));};};export default sendEditPostFunction;
